pageTitle: C&C California Roll Sleeve Dress with Cutout | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 32in / 81cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Wash cold. 55% cotton/45% polyester. Fabric: Slubbed jersey. Pastel stripes fade in chalky hues on a jersey dress from C&C California. A back cutout reveals a peek of skin, and a drawstring cinches the waist. Cuffed short sleeves. Lined skirt and unlined, semi-sheer bodice. Description Mini > Dresses > Clothing > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Cheyann Benedict and Claire Stansfield created C&C California to embody the classic 1970s California chic that they both longed for. The collection would be easy and wearable, yet certain to exude a laid-back appeal, and the pair began the trip to this goal by making The Perfect Tee. Picture Steve McQueen, Raquel Welch, and Natalie Wood beach or pool side, lounging, looking undeniably cool, satisfied, and inherently carefree, and you'll get a sense of C&C. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
